user.canProvide:
Here are some example of dope things I can be of help:
• Music playlists but not as good as @Scott Luttmann
• Travel plans especially to LATAM
• Starting and growing a EdTech startup
• UI design and building great UX flows in product
user.intro:
If you don't know me here are some facts:
• I'm a dual citizen of 🇧🇷 and 🇪🇸
• Lived in 3 different countries (🇧🇷 🇻🇪 🇵🇦) before coming to college in the 🇺🇸
• I went to Boston College 🦅 (class 2020) and double majored BA in CS and BS in Finance.
• Love music 🎶, cooking 👨🏻‍🍳, and traveling ✈️
• Was a Venture Partner from 2017 till 2020 and sourced 1 investment (Aryeo)
• Currently I'm the CTO and Co-Founder of Cariina (raised over $1.2m)
user.lookingFor: Meet badass people and make new friends!
